Package filehandler.zipservice

Class ZipUtility

java.lang.Object
filehandler.zipservice.ZipUtility
public class ZipUtility extends Object
Utility class for handling ZIP file operations, including extraction.

    • setFileBuffer

      public void setFileBuffer(int buffer)
      Initializes the buffer size for file extraction.
      Parameters:
      buffer - the size of the buffer in bytes

    • suppressExtractionLog

      public void suppressExtractionLog(boolean suppressExtractionLogging)
      Sets the logging behavior for directory creation during extraction.
      Parameters:
      suppressExtractionLogging - if true, suppresses log output during extraction

    • extractFile

      private void extractFile(ZipInputStream zipInputStream, File newFile) throws IOException
      Extracts a file from a ZIP input stream to a specified file location.
      Parameters:
      zipInputStream - the ZIP input stream containing the file to extract
      newFile - the destination file where the extracted content will be written
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during extraction

    • unzipAssignment

      public void unzipAssignment(File zippedAssignment, File assignmentContainer)
      Unzips a ZIP file into a specified container directory, creating directories as needed and handling both file and directory entries within the ZIP file.
      Parameters:
      zippedAssignment - the ZIP file to unzip
      assignmentContainer - the directory where contents will be extracted
